scripts.script_3:
-- Welcome to RoGold Studio Script Editor!
-- Write your Lua code here

print("Hello from RoGold Studio!")

-- Example: Create a simple GUI with Frame, TextLabel, and TextButton

-- Create a ScreenGui to hold our GUI elements
local screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
screenGui.Name = "ExampleGUI"
screenGui.Parent = game.Players.LocalPlayer.PlayerGui

-- Create a Frame as the main container
local frame = Instance.new("Frame")
frame.Name = "MainFrame"
frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 300, 0, 200)
frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -150, 0.5, -100)
frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2)
frame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.1
frame.BorderSizePixel = 2
frame.Parent = screenGui

-- Create a TextLabel to display text
local textLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
textLabel.Name = "TitleLabel"
textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, -20, 0, 50)
textLabel.Position = UDim2.new(0, 10, 0, 10)
textLabel.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(0.8, 0.8, 0.8)
textLabel.Text = "Welcome to RoGold Studio!"
textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 0)
textLabel.TextSize = 18
textLabel.Font = Enum.Font.SourceSansBold
textLabel.Parent = frame

-- Create a TextButton that can be clicked
local textButton = Instance.new("TextButton")
textButton.Name = "ClickButton"
textButton.Size = UDim2.new(0, 150, 0, 40)
textButton.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -75, 1, -60)
textButton.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(0.4, 0.6, 1)
textButton.Text = "Click Me!"
textButton.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1)
textButton.TextSize = 16
textButton.Font = Enum.Font.SourceSans
textButton.Parent = frame

-- Connect an event to the button
textButton.MouseButton1Click:Connect(function()
   print("Button was clicked!")
   textLabel.Text = "Button Clicked!"
   textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0, 1, 0)
   wait(2)
   textLabel.Text = "Welcome to RoGold Studio!"
   textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 0)
end)

print("GUI created successfully!")

script_3.Name: script_3
script_3.Source:
